2023-04-07 {/{/< bbc src="http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p0f72chj/player" >}} BBC Learning English - 6 Minute English / Do you get jealous easily?
Notes: motive of murder 谋杀动机
clinical 诊所的
horrid 引起反感的，可怕的
monitor 监控
obsessive-compulsive disorder 强迫症
harmonise 和谐，协调
recap 翻新，扼要重述
the green-eyed monster: (British English) from Othello 绿眼怪
jealousy: jealousy involved three people, but envy involved two
envy：wanting to have the possessions or qualities that someone else has
significant other: wife, husband or other romantic partner who you are in a long-term relationship with
flirting: behaving as if you are sexually attracted to someone but playfully rather than with serious intentions
pill： medicine in the form of small tablet which you swallow
cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT)： type of therapy which helps people deal with their emotional and behavioural problems by changing the way they think about them 认知行为疗法 test from pc
title: Learning English week1
